name: Quick Sun-Dried Tomato and Basil Hummus
author: VenturaMama77
summary: Just a few ingredients make this hummus easy to whip up on a moment's notice. Serve with chips, pita wedges, or crackers. Great on burgers and sandwiches too. Enjoy!
ingredients: 1 (15.5 ounce) can garbanzo beans, drained (reserve liquid) and rinsed
½ cup chopped sun-dried tomatoes (not oil-packed)
directions: Grind the garbanzo beans, sun-dried tomatoes, garlic, basil, and Parmesan cheese together in a food processor for 15 seconds
Add about 1/4 of the reserved liquid; grind another 15 seconds
Pour in enough additional reserved liquid, a small amount at a time, and grind; repeat until the consistency is like chunky peanut butter
Pour in the olive oil; grind for an additional 15 seconds
